name: Accordion
description: A box-shaped instrument that produces sound as you expand and contract its center.

name: Bagpipes
description: A set of pipes connected to a cloth bag.

name: Bass
description: A massive stringed instrument played with a bow.

name: Cello
description: A large stringed instrument played with a bow.

name: Clarinet
description: A straight horn with a flared end, usually colored black and white.

name: Cymbals
description: A pair of metal disks, crashed together in order to create music.

name: Drum
description: A percussion instrument consisting of cloth or hide stretched over a wooden cylinder.

name: Flute
description: A long, thin instrument made of wood or metal.

name: Gong
description: A metal disk, rang with a mallet to produce a long-lasting sound.

name: Guitar, acoustic
description: A stringed instrument with a distinctive soundhole.

name: Guitar, banjo
description: A guitar with a circular body similar to a drum.

name: Guitar, bass
description: An electric guitar with less strings that produces a deeper sound.

name: Guitar, electric
description: A guitar that produces a brighter, more energetic sound.

name: Guitar, ukelele
description: A miniature guitar.

name: Horn
description: A simple wind instrument used for signalling.

name: Kazoo
description: A short horn that produces a unique buzzing sound.

name: Lute
description: A commonly used stringed instrument.

name: Lyre
description: A stringed instrument similar to a small harp.

name: Maracas
description: A pair of wooden rattles, often decorated with fanciful colors or adornments.

name: Pan Flute
description: A set of pipes often used by satyrs.

name: Saxophone
description: A curved horn that comes in a wide array of octaves, usually made of brass.

name: Trombone
description: A long horn played by sliding one section forwards and back, usually made of brass.

name: Tambourine
description: A small, flat drum with metal rattles around its edge.

name: Trumpet
description: A horn with valves to alter the sound, usually made of brass.

name: Tuba
description: A heavy curved horn with an extremely low sound, usually made of brass.

name: Viola
description: A medium-sized stringed instrument played with a bow.

name: Violin
description: A small stringed instrument played with a bow, also called a fiddle.
